name: Bizango Blast
description: You've played and love those other physics games and now you're over those darn birds and want something with a new perspective?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 GTX or AMD Radeon RX480 series card or higher DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
